first_para: Robert John Blackman (born 26 April 1956), better known as Bob Blackman, is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Harrow East since 2010. He was also a member of the London Assembly, and the Conservative Friends of Israel group.

full.extract: Robert John Blackman (born 26 April 1956), better known as Bob Blackman, is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Harrow East since 2010. He was also a member of the London Assembly, and the Conservative Friends of Israel group.
full.title: Bob Blackman (politician)
